<<<<<<< HEAD
Scarron's city romance made English. Roman bourgeois. English Furetière, Antoine, 1619-1688. Scarron, Monsieur, 1610-1660.
[8], 244, [1] p.
Printed by T.N. for H. Herringman ..., In the Savoy [London] : 1671.
Translation of Furetière's Le roman bourgeois; not connected with Scarron. cf. Cambridge Bibliography of English Literature (1941), v. 2, p. 553. Errata: p. [1] at end. Item at reel 1694:7 identified as Wing S830 (number cancelled). Reproduction of the originals in the Harvard University Library and Bodleian Library.
=======
